landing.title: Find Benefits for Your Family
landing.description: Answer a few questions about your family's situation. We'll help you understand which benefits you may qualify for and what to do next.
landing.noAccountNote: No account needed Â· Your answers stay on your device
landing.expect2: Questions about your family, income, and insurance situation
landing.expect3: Personalized results showing which benefits you may qualify for
landing.expect4: Step-by-step guidance on what to do next
landing.nationwide: Available nationwide. Select your state during screening.

step1.title: Tell us about your family
step1.description: This helps us understand your household situation and which benefits might be available.
step1.stateLabel: What state do you live in?
step1.householdSizeLabel: How many people live in your home?
step1.householdSizeHelp: Include everyone living in your home

step2.title: Your household income and current benefits
step2.description: This information helps us understand what benefits you may already receive and what additional support might be available.
step2.monthlyIncomeLabel: What is your total monthly household income?
step2.monthlyIncomeHelp: Your total household income before taxes, per month
step2.receivesSSILabel: Does anyone in your household receive SSI?
step2.receivesSSIHelp: SSI (Supplemental Security Income) is a federal program that provides monthly payments to people with disabilities who have limited income and resources.
step2.receivesSNAPLabel: Does your household currently receive SNAP (food stamps)?
step2.receivesSNAPHelp: SNAP (Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program) helps families buy groceries through an EBT card loaded monthly.

step3.title: Diagnosis and insurance
step3.description: This information helps us understand your family member's needs and current coverage.
step3.hasDisabilityLabel: Has your family member been diagnosed with an intellectual or developmental disability?
step3.ageLabel: How old is your family member with a disability?
step3.ageHelp: Enter their current age in years
step3.hasInsuranceLabel: Does your family member have private health insurance?

step4.title: Functional needs
step4.description: These optional questions help us find additional programs. Skip any you prefer not to answer.
step4.workStatusLabel: What is your family member's work situation?
step4.workStatusHelp: This helps us check for employment-related programs
step4.unableToWork: Unable to work due to disability
step4.guardianLabel: Does your family member have a legal guardian?
step4.diagnosesLabel: Does your family member have any of these conditions? (select all that apply)
step4.diagnosesHelp: This helps us identify specialized programs
step4.limitationsLabel: Does your family member need help with any of these areas? (select all that apply)
step4.limitationsHelp: This helps match your family with the right level of support
step4.dailyLiving: Daily living activities (cooking, cleaning, managing money)
step4.social: Social skills (making friends, understanding social cues)

review.title: Review your answers
review.description: Please check that everything looks correct before we generate your results.
review.errorMessage: Something went wrong while finding benefits for your family. Please try again or contact us for help.

validation.householdSize: Please enter your household size (1 or more)
validation.householdSizeMax: Please enter a household size under 15
validation.incomeMax: Please enter a valid monthly income amount
validation.enterAge: Please enter the age of your family member with a disability
